sect1.title: Modifying Individual XSLT Processor Parameters
sect1.para: If you use the default DocBook layout and want to adjust individual parameters, you can use the --param "KEY=VALUE" or --stringparam "KEY=VALUE" option. Both options can be specified multiple times. It will pass on values for XSLT parameters directly to the XSLT processor, which is useful to temporarily overwrite style sheet parameters such as margins, for example.
For larger or more complex modifications, such as adjustments of the title page layout, for example, it is advisable to develop your own set of stylesheets instead.
